overview: Dear Diary, it's Halloween time again and since all the ghouls, goblins, ghosts and skeletons have come out of the whole family's closet this last year I was thinking about having a little family party! I figure if I can sucker Daddy into saying yes I could invite the whole family! My brothers, sisters, uncles, daddy & I! Imagine all the fun we could have! Maybe I could set it up to where I fuck one of my uncles and Daddy at the same time, or maybe I could share Daddy with my sister again! The possibilities are endless when the whole family is under one roof! You know what, that's EXACTLY what I'm going to do! This is going to be one whorrific Halloween! Especially if I wind up pregnant!!!
tagline: It's A Sexy, Family Halloween Party, But The Real Horror Starts When Hope Takes A Pregnancy Test!
title: Hope's Halloween Whorrors
